attributes.action: Time to change the national anthem if we are to win the World Cup
attributes.additional_details: We need to change the national anthem to something that we can relate to. God is a supernatural being which many British people do not believe in and the Queen seems like a lovely lady, but many do not want to bow down to her. If we are to win he World Cup we need a song that stirs the player's emotions. I suggest 'Hey Jude' but any good time will do.

rejection.details: Up to the Football Association to decide upon the anthem they wish to play.
